text: Shizhe [mu sheng] a! Buyao rang naxie zhengxian bu xinyang de ren shi ni youchou. Naxie ren zhong you qinkou shuo:“Women xinyangle.” Qishi, tamen de xinzhong bing bu xinyang; naxie ren zhong you xinfeng youtaijiao de, tamen wei shuohuang er qingting, wei meiyou laiguo ni zheli de qita minzhong er tanting. Tamen cuangai jingdian yuanwen bing shuo:“Jiaru gei nimen zhege, nimen jiu jieshou; jiaru bu gei nimen zhege, nimen jiu jingti.” An la yu jiang zainan gei shei, ni jue meiyou sihao nengli ke bangzhu ta diyu an la [jiangxia de zainan]. Zhexie ren, an la bu yuan jiejing tamen de xin, tamen zai jinshi zao lingru, zai houshi hai yao shou zhongda de xingfa.
